comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The loss of HMAS Sydney (II) with all 645 hands was perhaps Australia's greatest tragedy of the Second World War: www.navy.gov.au/HMAS_Sydney_(II)#Loss_of_HMAS_Sydney and here: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17783769 By 1946 more than 400,000 Pounds had been raised for the fund, the purpose of which seemed unclear: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article2667729
